p: Jiang et al. [ 37] found that the rosemary essential oil ( Rosmarinus officinalis L.) (REO) can be used in the food industry as a flavoring agent and preservative because of its antimicrobial and antioxidant properties [ 37]. Among the terpenes found in the composition of REO, the main components are the following: cineole, camphor, α-pinene, camphene, and α-terpineol [ 38, 39].
